mapper.select: select if(count(*), true, false) from user where root = 1;

select permission.permission_name from user join role on json_contains(user.roles, cast(role.id as char)) join permission on json_contains(role.permissions, cast(permission.id as char)) where user.id = #{userId} and user.status = 1;
select id from user where open_id = #{openId} and status = 1;

select user.id, open_id, nickname, avatar_url, name, sex, tel, roles, root, dept_id, status, ifnull(dept.dept_name, '') as dept_name from user left join dept on user.dept_id = dept.id where user.id = #{userId} and status = 1;
